name: Java Properties Editor (JFace TableViewer)
tagline: Eclipse plug-in for editing Java properties files using JFace TableViewer.
body:
Installation ------------ Click "Help -> Install new software" and paste update site URL:
http://mv2a.github.io/JavaPropertiesEditor/updates/ Usage ----- A new entry named "Table Properties Editor" will be available on *.properties files under the "Open With" context menu entry, Project or Package Explorer. License ------- GPL3
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
